page.title: 13 St Minver Holiday Estate
page.content: Immediately south of St Minver village is the St Minver House Holiday Estate, an extensive holiday complex which is the largest employer in the area. St Minver House was originally the{ {squire's manor house.}In{1965}the estate was sold and then the house became a hotel. During recent years,under different ownership,the estate has been developed as a self_catering holiday camp open from {Easter to mid September}with many recreational facilities. Most of the sixteen hectare site,which includes woodland, contains residential caravans and 26 chalets. There is also a field for tents and touring caravans. The complex when full,caters for about{1600 people.}Holidaymakers from the camp visit the major tourist attractions of Cornwall and the local beaches at Polzeath, Daymer and Rock.
